userStories.title: Sign Up & Immediate Value
userStories.action: sign in with one click and immediately see my actionable emails
userStories.benefit: I can start being productive without any setup
acceptanceCriteria: ‚úÖ "Sign in with Google" button on landing page
‚úÖ Single OAuth flow grants auth + Gmail read access
‚úÖ User sees "Analyzing your inbox..." loading state
‚ùå First tasks appear within 60 seconds
‚úÖ No additional setup steps required
userStories.notes: Auth working, extraction page exists. Need: Gmail API integration, Claude extraction, initial extraction endpoint

userStories.title: View My Action Items
userStories.action: see all my actionable items in one clean list
userStories.benefit: I know exactly what needs my attention
acceptanceCriteria: üöß Dashboard shows list of extracted items (UI only, mock data)
‚úÖ Each item shows: title, sender, category, time received
‚ùå Items sorted by priority/recency
üöß Can filter by category (tabs exist, not functional)
‚ùå Empty state if no items (with encouraging message)
userStories.notes: Dashboard UI complete with mock data. Need: Supabase queries, real-time subscriptions, sorting logic, filtering, empty states

userStories.title: Reply to Email
userStories.action: quickly reply to an email that needs response
userStories.benefit: I can take action without leaving my workflow
acceptanceCriteria: ‚úÖ "Reply" button on each relevant item
‚ùå Tapping opens Gmail compose in new tab/app
‚ùå Gmail compose pre-filled with: To, Subject (Re:), thread context
‚ùå After sending, user can mark item complete in Neriah
userStories.notes: Reply button UI exists. Need: Gmail deep link generation utility, onClick handler

userStories.title: View Invoice/Attachment
userStories.action: view invoices and attachments without digging through email
userStories.benefit: I can quickly review documents that need attention
acceptanceCriteria: Items with attachments show attachment icon
"View Invoice" / "View Attachment" button
PDF viewer opens in-app (or new tab)
Image attachments display inline
Can download attachment

userStories.title: Complete an Item
userStories.action: mark items as complete when I've handled them
userStories.benefit: my list stays clean and focused
acceptanceCriteria: ‚úÖ "Done" / checkmark button on each item
‚ùå Completed items move to "Completed" section (or hide)
‚ùå Can undo completion within 5 seconds
‚ùå Completion syncs to database immediately
userStories.notes: Done button UI exists. Need: API endpoint for completion, optimistic UI updates, undo functionality

userStories.title: Receive New Items Automatically
userStories.action: have new actionable items appear automatically
acceptanceCriteria: Background sync runs every 3 hours
New items appear at top of list
Push notification: "3 new items need attention"
Badge count updates on PWA icon
Can manually trigger sync (pull-to-refresh)

userStories.title: Snooze an Item
userStories.action: snooze items I can't handle right now
acceptanceCriteria: ‚úÖ "Snooze" button with options: Later today, Tomorrow, Next week
‚ùå Snoozed items disappear from main list
‚ùå Items reappear at scheduled time
‚ùå Can view all snoozed items in separate section
userStories.notes: Snooze button UI exists. Need: API endpoint, snooze logic, cron job to resurface items

userStories.title: Schedule Meeting from Email
userStories.benefit: I can book time without switching apps
acceptanceCriteria: ‚úÖ Items with meeting requests show "Schedule Meeting" button
‚ùå Tapping opens Google Calendar with pre-filled: title, time, attendees, description
‚ùå Can schedule directly or edit before creating
‚ùå After scheduling, can mark item complete
‚ùå Handles multiple suggested times from email
userStories.notes: Schedule button UI exists. Need: Google Calendar deep link generation, meeting data extraction from AI

userStories.title: View Categorized Receipts
userStories.action: see receipts auto-categorized by expense type
userStories.benefit: I can quickly find and review expenses
acceptanceCriteria: Receipts extracted with vendor, amount, date, invoice number
AI assigns category: Software, Travel, Medical, Office, Meals, Utilities, Other
Can filter dashboard: "Show only Travel receipts"
Receipt details display in structured format (vendor, amount, date, category)
Category badge shows on each receipt item

userStories.title: Review Receipt Details
userStories.action: view receipt PDFs and extracted details
acceptanceCriteria: "View Receipt" button opens in-app PDF viewer
Shows extracted: Vendor, Amount, Currency, Date, Invoice #, Category, Tax
Can download original PDF or image
Image receipts display inline
OCR confidence score displayed

userStories.title: Provide Feedback on Extractions
userStories.benefit: the AI improves over time and I can report issues
acceptanceCriteria: ‚úÖ Thumbs up/down buttons on each item (tasks, receipts, meetings)
‚ùå Optional: "What was wrong?" comment field
‚ùå Feedback saved immediately
‚ùå Visual confirmation after submission ("Thanks for your feedback!")
‚ùå Can change feedback after submission
userStories.notes: Thumbs up/down button UI exists. Need: API endpoint for feedback, dialog for comments, optimistic UI updates
